00002  * File: mthRockFluidModel.h 
00003  * ------------------------- 
00004  * Header file for RockFluid Model (Krp~Sp, Pc~Sp)

00006  * 2) calculate phase capillary pressure (function of saturation)

00010  *

00017

00040
